tool.name: Gdal_Contour
tool.description: Builds vector contour lines from a raster elevation model.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py output_data_Result $output_data_Result name Gdal_Contour InputDSN '$InputDSN' OutputDSN '$OutputDSN' i '$i' a '$a' b $b prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_Result $OutputSection_Result.transmissionMode_Result

param.name: InputDSN
param.label: The input data source name
param.help: The input data source name to use.

param.name: a
param.label: Attribute name
param.help: provides a name for the attribute in which to put the elevation. If not provided no elevation attribute is attached.

param.name: b
param.label: The band number
param.help: A particular band, defaults to band 1.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Result
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
